name: 陳隆建

1.explore the Crystal Cycle of prosperity period2. explore the contents and current of the key component and material in the Electro-Optical Industry3.know and apply the research tool of Porter's, SWOT's, and Diamond's for qualitative4.know and apply the research tool of SPSS for quantification5.develop and apply the model of the creative mechanism in technology6.perform the application of patent
